title: csv package LazyQuotes bug
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue. Thanks!

1. What version of Go are you using (`go version`)?
go version go1.6 darwin/amd64

2. What operating system and processor architecture are you using (`go env`)?
GOARCH="amd64"
GOBIN=""
GOEXE=""
GOHOSTARCH="amd64"
GOHOSTOS="darwin"
GOOS="darwin"

3. What did you do?
(Use play.golang.org to provide a runnable example, if possible.)
https://play.golang.org/p/Ibi4KpmgiE

4. What did you expect to see?
[[2 The Godfather 1972]]

5. What did you see instead?
[[2 The Godfather|1972]]
 - notice the | character that means, it is not split

**Extra notes:**
In the play.golang.org example, if you move the double quote after the letter T
then it works just fine
however it seems like if the double quote is right after the delimiter, the outcome is not as expected
